statements: SELECT * FROM genetic_modifications;
SELECT crop_name, modification_type FROM genetic_modifications;
SELECT * FROM genetic_modifications WHERE crop_name = 'Rice';
SELECT * FROM genetic_modifications ORDER BY modification_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM genetic_modifications WHERE pest_resistance = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM genetic_modifications WHERE crop_name = 'Rice';
SELECT id, crop_name FROM genetic_modifications WHERE pest_resistance = TRUE;
SELECT crop_name, modification_type FROM genetic_modifications WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY modification_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM genetic_modifications WHERE crop_name LIKE '%corn%' AND pest_resistance = FALSE;
SELECT DISTINCT crop_name FROM genetic_modifications WHERE modification_type = 'GMO';
SELECT crop_name, pest_resistance FROM crops WHERE crop_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM modifications WHERE modification_type = 'GMO' ORDER BY modification_date DESC;
SELECT crop_name FROM crops WHERE pest_resistance = TRUE;
SELECT modification_type, modification_date FROM modifications WHERE crop_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM crops ORDER BY crop_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM crops WHERE crop_name ='Tomato';
SELECT crop_name, pest_resistance FROM crops WHERE pest_resistance = TRUE ORDER BY crop_id DESC;
SELECT modification_id, modification_type, modification_date FROM modifications WHERE modification_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY modification_date ASC;
SELECT crop_name FROM crops WHERE pest_resistance = FALSE AND crop_name LIKE '%apple%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT c.crop_name, m.modification_type FROM crops c JOIN modifications m ON c.crop_id = m.crop_id WHERE m.modification_type = 'GMO' ORDER BY c.crop_name ASC, m.modification_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM CropGeneticModifications;
SELECT PestName, PestType FROM PestInfo WHERE PestType = 'Insect';
SELECT CropID, ModificationType FROM CropGeneticModifications ORDER BY ModificationDate DESC;
SELECT CropID, PestName, ResistanceLevel FROM CropPestResistance WHERE ResistanceLevel > 2;
SELECT DISTINCT ModificationType FROM CropGeneticModifications;
SELECT * FROM CropGeneticModifications WHERE ModificationType = 'GMO' AND PestResistance = TRUE;
SELECT CropID, ModificationType, PestResistance FROM CropGeneticModifications WHERE ModificationDate >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT CropGeneticModifications.ModificationType, PestInfo.PestName FROM CropGeneticModifications JOIN CropPestResistance ON CropGeneticModifications.CropID = CropPestResistance.CropID JOIN PestInfo ON CropPestResistance.PestID = PestInfo.PestID;

SELECT CropGeneticModifications.ModificationType, PestInfo.PestName, CropPestResistance.ResistanceLevel FROM CropGeneticModifications LEFT JOIN CropPestResistance ON CropGeneticModifications.CropID = CropPestResistance.CropID LEFT JOIN PestInfo ON CropPestResistance.PestID = PestInfo.PestID;
SELECT COUNT(CropID) AS TotalCrops, COUNT(PestID) AS TotalPests FROM CropGeneticModifications, PestInfo;
SELECT * FROM CropGenes
SELECT gene_name, crop_name FROM CropGenes WHERE resistance_trait = 'Pest Resistant'
SELECT * FROM Pesticides ORDER BY pesticide_name DESC
SELECT target_crop, target_pest FROM Pesticides WHERE application_method = 'Spray'

SELECT field.trial_id, gene.gene_name, pesticide.pesticide_name, trial.trial_date FROM FieldTrials AS field JOIN CropGenes AS gene ON field.crop_id = gene.gene_id JOIN Pesticides AS pesticide ON field.pesticide_id = pesticide.pesticide_id
SELECT * FROM CropGenes ORDER BY crop_name DESC
SELECT gene_name, resistance_trait FROM CropGenes WHERE gene_name = 'ABC'
SELECT * FROM Pesticides WHERE application_method = 'Fumigation'
SELECT * FROM GeneSequence WHERE sequence_length > 1000
SELECT * FROM FieldTrials ORDER BY trial_date ASC
SELECT * FROM Crop WHERE pest_resistance_level = 'High';
SELECT name, modification_date FROM Crop ORDER BY modification_date DESC;
SELECT id, name, modification_type FROM Crop WHERE modification_type = 'GMO';
SELECT * FROM Crop WHERE modification_type IS NULL;
SELECT name FROM Crop WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Crop ORDER BY name DESC, modification_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT name, pest_resistance_level FROM Crop WHERE pest_resistance_level = 'High' ORDER BY modification_date DESC
SELECT name, modification_type, modification_date FROM Crop WHERE modification_type IS NOT NULL ORDER BY modification_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM Crop WHERE name LIKE '%corn%' OR name LIKE '%potato%' ORDER BY modification_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, name FROM Crop WHERE pest_resistance_level IS NULL ORDER BY id ASC
